topic.title: Vice - The Cryptocurrency-Based Projects That Would Pay Everyone Just for Being Alive
topic.body:
* [Vice - The Cryptocurrency-Based Projects That Would Pay Everyone Just for Being Alive](http://www.vice.com/read/the-cryptocurrency-based-schemes-that-would-pay-everyone-just-for-being-alive-456)
* [Motherboard - How Bitcoin Could Make Distributing a Universal Basic Income Actually Possible](http://motherboard.vice.com/read/how-bitcoin-could-make-distributing-a-universal-basic-income-actually-possible)
* in english on ZeroNet : [Relative Theory of Money - blog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1C8s97X8vy5KaGpHmAbaNu5uUr1QQEsast)
* in french on ZeroNet : [Th√©orie Relative de la Monnaie - blog](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Js82VboDqPz4KX7b7Bc5CVhJGrYyVnuwQ)
* [RTM on the web](http://vit.free.fr/TRM/en_US/)
* [TRM on the web](http://trm.creationmonetaire.info/)
* https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic_income

2053_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body:
The term "Darknet", in the description of the forum, comes from Google, which can't make money on it (the P2P protocols/apps).
Please replace "Darknet" by "Free-net" or "Open net" or simply "Internet"
